item.title: Child Protection Failures Spark Public Debate - Eli Hart
item.description: Julissa Thaler Did The Unimaginable To Her Son!

media:content.media:title: Child Protection Failures Spark Public Debate - Eli Hart
media:content.media:description: Julissa Thaler Did The Unimaginable To Her Son!

item.title: Nobody Was There To Save Lily Hanrahan
item.description: In November 2017, 21-month-old Lilly Hanrahan was left in the care of babysitter Sean Sadler in Birmingham, UK. She suffered a catastrophic head injury and six broken ribs after being violently shaken and beaten. Medical exams revealed 40 separate injuries, some weeks old. Sadler was convicted of murder and wounding in 2021 and given a life sentence with a minimum 20-year term. The case exposed grave failures in safeguarding and the risks children face when entrusted to dangerous caregivers. How many more innocent lives must be lost before we overhaul child protection systems?

item.title: She Hid Her Parents for 4 YEARS | Virginia McCullough | Bodycam
item.description: This case is insanity! Aside from the other children of the couple not contacting their parents for YEARS, her being so calm on the bodycam footage? What are your thoughts? x Em

item.title: Rurik Jutting Didn't Use His High IQ For Good
item.description: In 2014, British banker Rurik Jutting murdered two Indonesian women, Sumarti Ningsih and Seneng Mujiasih, inside his Hong Kong apartment after days of torture and drug-fueled violence. He recorded parts of the assaults, revealing a shocking descent into sadism. Arrested after calling police himself, he was convicted of murder in 2016 and sentenced to life in prison. How does someone with every advantage fall into such terrifying depravity?

item.title: He Claimed She Just DISAPPEARED | Breasia Terell
item.description: In 2020, 10-year-old Breasia Terrell disappeared after visiting her half-brother’s father, Henry Dinkins, in Davenport, Iowa. A massive months-long search ended in 2021 when her remains were found in a rural area. Dinkins was later convicted of first-degree murder and kidnapping, revealing a history of predatory behavior. Breasia’s case devastated her community and sparked calls for stronger protections for vulnerable children. How do we stop known offenders before they destroy another innocent life?

item.title: 8-Year-Old Survives & Helps Solve Her Own Case
item.description: 8-Year-Old Survives & Helps Solve Her Own Case

item.title: Sleep Walking Accident or a Twisted Lie?
item.description: What was your first thought when you guys heard the 911 call and saw the interrogation footage? - Em x

item.title: Teacher Turns Evil: Monica Elizabeth Young ��
item.description: Monica Elizabeth Young was just 23 when she began grooming a 14-year-old boy via Snapchat, then used her position of trust in a Sydney school to take things further in the classroom. This is another case which shows you that not all predators are male.

item.title: Transphobic Teen Led Her to a Dark End | Brianna Ghey
item.description: In 2023, 16-year-old Brianna Ghey, a transgender girl from Warrington, England, was found fatally stabbed in a local park. Two 15-year-olds were later convicted after evidence revealed they had planned the attack for weeks, driven by violent fantasies. The case sparked national grief and urgent discussions about youth radicalization and targeted violence. How do we protect vulnerable teens when danger can grow quietly among their peers?

item.title: She Vanished on a Disney Cruise!
item.description: In 2011, 24-year-old Rebecca Coriam, a Disney Cruise Line crew member, vanished from the Disney Wonder while the ship sailed off the coast of Mexico. CCTV captured her looking distressed hours before she disappeared, but no one saw what happened next. Despite investigations, her body was never found, and the cause of her disappearance remains unknown. How can someone vanish at sea without a single clear answer to what truly happened?

item.title: You Can't Believe What She Did To Her Ex
item.description: In 2018, Ezra McCandless lured her ex-boyfriend Alex Woodworth to a rural road in Wisconsin, where she stabbed him to death during a staged confrontation. She later claimed self-defense, but evidence showed planning and inconsistent accounts. In 2019, she was convicted of first-degree intentional homicide and sentenced to life with the possibility of extended supervision after 50 years. What drives someone to turn a turbulent relationship into deadly violence?

item.title: 3 Little Boys That Lost Their Lives To A Terrible Monster
item.description: In 1989, Westley Allan Dodd abducted, raped, and murdered three young boys in Washington State, crimes that horrified the nation. He kept detailed journals of his acts and admitted he would kill again if freed. Convicted of aggravated murder, Dodd requested execution and was hanged in 1993—the first U.S. hanging in decades. His case reignited debate over capital punishment and rehabilitation. How does someone become so consumed by darkness that they seek no redemption?

item.title: Tortured His Disabled Ex & Went to Eat CASUALLY
item.description: In February 2024, 20-year-old Melody Hoffman — a vulnerable young woman with special needs who may have been in the early stages of pregnancy — vanished after spending the night with people she trusted.

item.title: The Dentist Who Poisoned His Wife Day by Day☎️
item.description: A US dentist who poisoned his wife has been sentenced to life in prison without parole after a Colorado jury found him guilty of murder and other charges. James Craig, 47, had been having an affair when he plotted to kill his wife Angela Craig in March 2023. What do you guys think of this incredibly chilling case?

item.title: She Could Call 911 in Her Last Moments | Denise A. Lee
item.description: In 2008, 21-year-old Denise Amber Lee was abducted from her Florida home by Michael King. Despite multiple 911 calls from witnesses, delays and miscommunication prevented her rescue. She was found murdered two days later. King was convicted and sentenced to death. Her case led to major reforms in emergency response systems and the creation of the Denise Amber Lee Foundation. How many lives could be saved if every cry for help was answered in time?

item.title: He Said It Was for "Honour"
item.description: In 2023, 17-year-old Fatima survived a brutal attack by her parents, Ihsan and Zahraa Ali, outside Timberline High School in Washington. The assault, believed to be an attempted “honor killing,” was caught on camera. In court, Fatima bravely condemned them as “disgusting monsters” for trying to end her life over cultural shame. Both parents were sentenced for attempted murder. Her courage turned tragedy into defiance. How can love become so twisted by pride and control?

item.title: WHEN LOVE TURNS INTO A NIGHTMARE: The Heartbreaking Story of Samantha Ford
item.description: In this episode of 'Emma Kenny Crime Time', we delve into the chilling case of Samantha Ford, a British mother who tragically drowned her own twinS in December 2018. The narrative uncovers the horrific incident that occurred in Margate, Kent, when Ford, struggling with the end of her marriage, killed her twins, Jake and Chloe Ford, by drowning them in the bath.

item.title: BETRAYED By Her Childhood Friend - Keeley Bunker
item.description: In 2019, 20-year-old Keeley Bunker was found dead in a stream in Tamworth, England, after celebrating her friend’s birthday. Her supposed friend, Wesley Streete, who had promised to walk her home safely, was later found guilty of raping and murdering her. He received a life sentence with a minimum term of 30 years. Keeley’s death became a heartbreaking reminder that danger can come from those we trust most. How do we teach safety when the threat wears a friendly face?

item.title: He Bragged About His Twisted Crimes��

item.title: He Was Caught on Camera Before Doing the Unthinkable
item.description: Do you think this absolutely haunting and twisted crime could have been prevented?
